name: Percival the Possessed Pumpkin
description:
Percival the Possessed Pumpkin is in a particularly perilous predicament...partially preserved in purgatory, Percy must pursue pardon for his profligate pride. 

Help Percy escape purgatory as he switches between his physical and ghostly forms!

Controls:

A,D - Move

Space - Jump

Programming: MQ Nguyen,  Carlos Rubins, Zihao Wang

Art: Jasmine Li

Audio: Gibby, Lyana
